data.title: A Christmas Hero 2020, Cast, Description, Review
data.meta_description: A Christmas Hero 2020,Cast, Description, Review. A guardian angel shows a disillusioned war veteran what he means to others and that his life makes a difference.
data.text:
Welcome to the heartwarming world of “A Christmas Hero,” where the spirit of the season intertwines with the courage of one ordinary person, destined for extraordinary deeds. As the holiday cheer fills the air and families gather around crackling fireplaces, our protagonist, though unassuming at first glance, holds the key to a Yuletide miracle.

Summary of A Christmas Hero

In the charming town of Evergreen Valley, the holiday season is in full swing, with twinkling lights adorning every street corner and the scent of freshly baked cookies filling the air. Amidst the festive cheer, a heartwarming tale unfolds.

Meet Sarah, a dedicated elementary school teacher with a passion for spreading joy to her students and community. Despite facing personal challenges, Sarah’s spirit remains unyielding as she prepares for the annual Christmas pageant. Little does she know, her life is about to take an unexpected turn.

When a sudden snowstorm traps a group of stranded travelers in Evergreen Valley, including a weary businessman named David, Sarah’s compassionate nature shines through. With the town’s resources stretched thin and the Christmas pageant in jeopardy, Sarah steps up to lead the efforts to provide shelter and support to the stranded visitors.

As Sarah and David work together to bring comfort to those in need, they discover a deeper connection blossoming between them. Yet, with time running out and obstacles mounting, Sarah must summon the courage to confront her doubts and fears to ensure that the spirit of Christmas prevails.

In “A Christmas Hero,” join Sarah, David, and the residents of Evergreen Valley on a heartfelt journey of love, compassion, and the true meaning of the holiday season. Amidst the snowflakes and twinkling lights, discover how one act of kindness can ignite a chain of events that transforms ordinary individuals into extraordinary heroes.

A Christmas Hero Details

Release Date: December 8, 2020

Language: English

Filming Locations: USA, Kalamazoo Air Zoo

Country Of Origin: United States

Genres: Drama, Family, Fantasy

A Christmas Hero Cast

1-Michael Welch as Nick

Born: 1987 (age 36 years), Los Angeles, CA

Spouse: Samantha Maggio (m. 2016), Marissa Lefton (m. 2008–2011)

Height: 5′ 10″

Children: 2

Michael Welch is an American actor. He is best known for the role of Luke Girardi on the television series Joan of Arcadia and for the role of Mike Newton in the films Twilight, New Moon, Eclipse, and Breaking Dawn.

2-Peter Carey as Brandon

He was born in 1943 (age 80 years), Bacchus Marsh, Australia. Peter Philip Carey AO is an Australian novelist. He is one of only five writers to have won the Booker Prize twice—the others being J. G. Farrell, J. M. Coetzee, Hilary Mantel and Margaret Atwood

Awards: Booker Prize, AACTA Award for Best Adapted Screenplay in Film

Spouse: Alison Summers (m. 1985–2005), Leigh Weetman (m. 1964–1980), Frances Coady

Notable works: Oscar and Lucinda, True History of the Kelly Gang

3-Kayla Kelly as Lynn

Kayla Kelly is an American actress born and raised in Michigan’s Upper Peninsula. As a little girl, she entertained her family by performing skits with cardboard boxes, puppets, and costume scraps. She would stand on tables and sing at the top of her lungs, and record make-believe radio broadcasts.

She was a performer before she even learned how to read. At the age of 8, Kayla began to write and illustrate her own stories, presenting them to her class during show and tell. She knew she was meant to entertain. In the years following, Kayla joined a theater group and school choir; she had set her sights on becoming an actor.

Then, her whole life changed when she became a mother at the age of 18, but she never forgot her dream. She put things on hold to raise her family; taking numerous odd jobs, graduating from college, and working for an Ophthalmologist for over 10 years.

At the age of 32, an old theater friend asked her to audition for a local play, and she was cast as the female lead. Kayla had stepped back onto the theater stage for the first time in over a decade.

She knew this was the sign she was waiting for the sign that it was time to chase her dream. In early 2016, shortly after appearing in that theater production, she was cast in her first film role. She hasn’t looked back since.

4-Lauren Rys Martin as Michelle

Lauren Rys Martin is known for No Sudden Move (2021), Beyond Belief: Fact or Fiction (1997), and A Haunting in Cawdor (2015).

5-Peter J. Gray as Zach

The first in his family line to act, Peter grew up far away from TV in a country home where fifty acres of forest and imagination entertained. After high school, he embarked on an adventure in South America where he lived on the coast learning Spanish and teaching English. A year away from finishing his degree in International Economics and Development, his University plays kicked him into the acting world. While shooting a short film in Toronto, he stopped by an agency unannounced, soaked with rain, without a resume, and introduced himself. Three days after turning him down, the agency found his info and called him in to audition for a Feature film. Since then he has thrown himself headlong into acting and filmmaking.

A Christmas Hero Director, Writer

Writer: Phil Wurtzel

Born in Kalamazoo, Michigan. Phil, over the last decade, has produced, directed, and written projects that have starred Oscar-nominated Seymour Cassel, Cary Elwes, Oscar-nominated Barkhad Abdi, Noah Jupe, Chloe Grace Moretz, Lakeith Stanfield, Tobin Bell, Michael Pare, Penelope Ann Miller, and Shelby Young.

Director: Patti Wittenberg

Patti Wittenberg is known for A Christmas Hero (2020), Shadow of Light (2018), and Dormant Evil.

A Christmas Hero Conclusion

When a young war vet returns home from Afghanistan, he struggles to find joy in the life he once knew. As he comes close to giving up all hope, his guardian angel pays a visit to show him there’s more meaning to his life than he’s ever known.
